content: Does cracking knuckles or regular exercising cause osteoarthritis?

Cracking knuckles and regular exercising do not cause osteoarthritis. In fact, regular exercise can help prevent osteoarthritis by strengthening the muscles around the joints and improving joint flexibility. However, it is important to exercise properly and avoid putting too much stress on the joints. If you have any concerns about your joint health, it is always best to consult with a healthcare professional.
